text: The Deluge () is a 1974 Polish Russian Lithuanian drama movie directed by Jerzy Hoffman and was based on the 1886 novel of the same name by Henryk Sienkiewicz. It stars Daniel Olbrychski, Małgorzata Braunek, Władysław Hańcza, Leszek Teleszyński, Bruno O'Ya, Kazimierz Wichniarz, Krzysztof Kowalewski and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1975. ==Other websites== * Category:1974 drama movies Category:1970s historical movies Category:1970s epic movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Lithuanian movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Jerzy Hoffman Category:Movies set in the 17th century Category:Movies set in Poland
title: The Deluge (movie)
